hero.name: Nicolas Torres
hero.title: Full Stack Developer 🚀
hero.description: I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer with experience building modern web applications that deliver brilliant user experiences. 💪✨

about.title: About me 😎
about.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer TypeScript-First 🚀💥
about.description: I create web products from start to finish with Node.js + Express on the server and Next.js 14 on the frontend, always prioritising TypeScript and a smooth user experience. 🔥💻

metrics.title: Performance Metrics
metrics.subtitle: Real results that speak for themselves

specialties.title: My Superpowers 🦸‍♂️
specialties.description: Turning ideas into digital experiences that captivate ✨🎨

methodology.title: Methodology 🧠
methodology.description: Lightweight agile practice: atomic commits, small PRs, CI/CD with GitHub Actions, living documentation in MD and rapid cycles of «ship → learn → improve». 🔄⚡

workStyle.title: How I work 🤝
workStyle.description: Always with humour and respect; I contribute useful ideas, communicate seamlessly in EN/ES and keep the team aligned. 😄🌟

projects.title: Key projects 🚀
projects.subtitle: Solutions that have generated real impact 💥
projects.spiritory: Premium e-commerce for spirits; full-stack maintenance and new features 🥃✨
projects.quick10x: Real-time crypto screener with subscriptions and admin panel ₿📊
projects.spiritory_impact: Europe's largest whisky trading platform and soon the world's! 🌍🥃
projects.quick10x_impact: Real-time crypto screener with subscriptions and admin panel 📈💎

personal.title: A bit more about me 🤠
personal.description: Outside of code, I record videos for YouTube, launch SaaS side-projects and share dev tips on social media. Programming is my number one hobby. 📺🎮💻

cta.title: Ready to create something incredible? 🚀✨
cta.description: Let's work together to turn your vision into a digital reality that stands out. 🎯💫
cta.alternative: Or connect with me on LinkedIn 🔗

modal.title: Let's talk about your project! 🚀
modal.description: Tell me about your vision and let's create something incredible together ✨

timeline.placeholder: When do you need the project?

description.placeholder: Tell me more about your project, objectives and specific requirements...

name.format: Name can only contain letters and spaces

success.title: Message sent successfully! 🎉
success.description: Thank you for reaching out. I'll get back to you within 24 hours.

testimonial.title: Featured testimonial 🌟
testimonial.quote: Nicolas is an exceptional developer with a deep understanding of modern web technologies. His ability to solve complex problems and deliver high-quality code is impressive. 🔥💪
testimonial.author: Client at spiritory GmbH 👤
